channel.title: Old Blog of Stephen Wyatt Bush
channel.description: Recent content on Old Blog of Stephen Wyatt Bush

item.title: "Dad and The Ten Commandments of Egoless Programming"
item.description: Dad and I got to talk about programming for two weeks before he died. I was 22, a senior in college completing a BFA in graphic design. Dad was 62, an older dad than most. When he started programming at Tennessee Tech back in the 60s, he wrote FORTRAN on punch cards. He was a wealth of knowledge. I had just been introduced to code that semester, and it was already consuming my thoughts.
